entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Pitt Meadows
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:52 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Pitt Meadows 10:00 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: -5.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa rising
Humidity: 93 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -6.1°C
Wind: SE 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday: Periods of ice pellets mixed with snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of ice pellets or snow mixed with freezing rain changing to freezing rain this afternoon. Ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain or freezing rain. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain changing to periods of rain late this evening. Rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022
